acid.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a chemical substance that has a pH of less than 7. Strong acids can burn holes in material or damage your skin
acid.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: a juicy apple with a slightly acid flavour
acid.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: an acid soil does not contain much lime1(3)
acid.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: Blueberry bushes need a very acid soil.
